code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ListadoMaterias=()=>{const[materias,setMaterias]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/materias').then(response=>{setMaterias(response.data);}).catch(error=>{console.error('Hubo un error al obtener las materias:',error);});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"mb-4",children:"Listado de Materias"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"list-group",children:materias.map(materia=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"list-group-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"mb-1",children:materia.nombre}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mb-1",children:materia.descripcion})]},materia.id))})]});};export default ListadoMaterias;
